trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Bossier City
There were no other sightings in Bossier City on or around January 7th 2007
Summary: My wife and I saw this for over an hour
divs: Sighting DetailsWe were driving home from watching sugar bowl in bossier city and we saw a cylinder hovering. We checked it out and took pictures. Ithovered for about 15 minutes and then we saw it move like it was weightless about 30 miles away. It only took about 15 seconds to make trip. I am sure it was UFO. Others in area reported same UFO. We do have picture if u want
